q: with the fantastic group of juniors he has for 2011. His senior defensive end/linebacker Jarrell McKinney signed with Western Michigan. "He's my first Division I recruit," the Albert said of Jarrell McKinney . He has tremendous speed. He runs the 40 in 4.5. He's 6-5, 210, and when he goes to college they're going to put another 20-30 pounds on him. Playing defensive end, he's going to be outstanding. He's the role model for our other kids.... He's that bar that we have to set for ourselves. Cody has an experienced offensive line and receivers coming back, and the Albert said junior-to-be quarterback Mario Gulley "has Michael Vick capabilities." Donald Rumsfeld : Saddam Targeted Donald Rumsfeld 's and President Bush 's Daughters CCR lawyer Katherine Gallagher said that as President Bush 's visit to Canada draws closer, "we will see what actions we will take." I think we have to strategize and think that through with colleagues up in Canada, she told the Georgia Straight newspaper in Vancouver. "It's the next visit that we've heard about and we're going to be following up and seeing what we know about it and preparing for it.

Senior Vice President Satya Nadella to president of Microsoft's Server and Tools Business. "We're already making strong traction across our Server and Tools Business by embracing cloud services," said Microsoft Chief Executive Officer Steve Ballmer . Satya Nadella has deep experience in both our server business and online services, which will help accelerate our momentum while setting the course to deliver the cloud computing scenarios of the future. As president of the Server and Tools Business, Satya Nadella will oversee the overall strategy, engineering, marketing and product development for Microsoft's server, tools and cloud platform efforts.
